tweets.text:
I've heard the @EnvAgency are surprised NGOs are refusing to work with them.

Why?

The River Avon catchment is comprised of 5 chalk streams protected as SSSI and SAC. In 2020 @wessexwater spent 26,916 hours dumping sewage into the river.

https://t.co/zslGdsV3lC

tweets.text:
@PJennings88 @EnvAgency A "good statement" that contains not a single shred of evidence the chalk aquifer is under threat.
How many times do you expect to cry wolf?

Grow your network in Natural Flood Management ü§ù

Hear from NFM experts inc. @YorkshireWater‚Äôs Granville Davies, Matt Hodkin and Jenny Barlow from @EnvAgency and Will Mayes from @UniOfHull on how your business can innovate in this emerging sector. Book ‚¨áÔ∏è

https://t.co/a1Sgc95D6q https://t.co/bhCvaXOmdR
@Calderdale Enjoying nature and a stroll beside the River Calder. Hang on, what is this beige substance pouring into the river? @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater https://t.co/9tJaK8HoT4

https://t.co/9wX7a8zVSx
Recognise this? @EnvAgency is not fit for purpose! Odour for years.. no firm action has led to an #environmentaldisaster. An independent enquiry to audit actions undertaken as a result of our complaints is essential. @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC https://t.co/RyMPNaKxAQ
@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg come to Clayton ! @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids Come Taste This !!@ @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/MR9mGnwEUP

@tayz_BETH @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe It is taste isn't it, God only knows what it's doing to our bodies, don't believe for 1 minute it's short term only, especially when short term exposure is hours at a time #stopthestink

Not looking forward to @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill ‚Äòwind to change‚Äô tonight... Pray for Newcastle under Lyme @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @StaffordshireCC @EnvAgencyMids amazed that‚Äôs it BAU as normal from Monday - absolute lunacy @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/kaFVeSz2GE

Complaints are high, the radius widens. We‚Äôve just had our worst 10 days ever & if it wasn‚Äôt for our air purifier we would have abandoned the house. Yet the @EnvAgency allow @RedIndustries2 / WQ to restart tipping? The death knell sounds for the town üòî @MattHancock @DefraGovUK https://t.co/uTebkN4TyG https://t.co/zOC5tUzMwN

tweets.text: This has to STOP! Mark my words -someone is going to suffer serious harm or worse here,this is not a joke,an exaggeration.We are not bored housewives picking a fight.This is our lives, our kids lives & our health @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland https://t.co/c9zXFNsTF1

Here is a good statement reflecting our concerns with regard to HS2 Tunnelling and the impact on the chalk aquifer https://t.co/tUIdNMbtSW
It is with sadness we announce a very compliant @EnvAgency have approved the tunnelling without any public consultation.

@TheRealMother2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @NewsNBC So basically , sit back keep a stiff upper lip watch your children suffer , keep calm and carry on and every other cliche they can muster . The whole panel of experts in this country are lazy and a joke .taken from https://t.co/DMnNxKHjcT @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off https://t.co/F9746AEdmm

On all fronts for the @RiverChess our biggest opponent is the @EnvAgency you would have thought we had shared ambitions. Apparently not, they have lost their way. They hide issues, misguide the public and Government and put the environment at risk, how has it come to this? https://t.co/EB81UUcQw9

tweets.text: Heard from sources that the @EnvAgency are planning to radically change their pollution response procedure. Will now only attend serious pollution incidents. Begs the question define serious & how would they know if they do not attend? Replace one broken system with another.

@PJennings88 @EnvAgency Been like that for a while - and they take the water industry's advice on whether it is serious - the most ridiculous mismanagement of regulation imaginable but presumably how @DefraGovUK wants it. No confidence in @EnvAgency is long overdue.

@hayulls @Lucy_Lapwing @LGSpace @Buzz_dont_tweet @DandelionAppre1 @Love_plants @wildflower_hour @WildFlowerSoc @BiodiversitySoS @MeadowInGarden @DaveGoulson @RewildingB A too common sight around #Banbury and in a play area too. Children should be exposed to Daisies and Dandelions not toxic herbicides @banburyfm @banburynews @Cherwellcouncil @TownEvents @EnvAgency https://t.co/trPXmKhNrN

tweets.text: @NewsNBC this has to stop now- the level of the complaints & the @EnvAgency monitoring results are surely enough evidence to serve an abatement order. This has to be stopped NOW, we cannot go on like this. They are killing us @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @DefraGovUK https://t.co/jhqkKtcXPH
@JamesA_1234 @StinkStopthe @SimonTagg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL That might risk upsetting Walleys Quarry Ltd formerly known as @redindustries2  and that must not be allowed #stopthestink

@SimonTagg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL I‚Äôve officially asked the EA if the 4 monitoring stations can provide real time data feeds to local residents via a website. I see no reason why this isn‚Äôt already being done? Residents need this information to safeguard themselves given published instances above permitted levels

Seriously?The labour ward is full of gas?What assessment of risk has there been for those giving birth with respiratory conditions,covid&newborn babies @PHE_EoEngland @MattHancock @StaffordshireCC Depraved @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK https://t.co/CZXS7YtnjD

tweets.text: @ErinBrockovich remember in the film where residents were given a letter saying the water was fine?Yeh.We‚Äôre at the point now. Parents have received a letter saying there is no long term health affects from landfill gasesüëáWalley‚Äôs quarry will become a movie one day #stopthestink https://t.co/uSV5DGDAp5

With the end of election publicity restrictions I am back as lead spokesperson for @NewsNBC our councillors and officers speak as one when we urge further action by @EnvAgencyMids to relieve the foul gas stink from Walleys Quarry landfill. @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/8gj36tg4D2

Please tell us @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids why then does this Hell Hole stink to high heaven and send its foul pong over an 8 mile radius across NUL borough? PLEASE TELL US !!!!
@StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/yczVuiMs7P

Officers worked behind the scenes to make sure the #Ely boat race went smoothly.

This involved ensuring the river remained closed so that no boaters could enter the race circuit. 

Also fixing any obstructions on the river that could disturb the race. #FunFactFriday @theboatrace https://t.co/F2BXwuvKD3

tweets.text: Like clock work, every Friday night at 10pm the stench has seeped into my home, regardless of any other factors. That can‚Äôt be a coincidence. #stopthestink @RedIndustries2 #WalleysQuarry @WalleysL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids

@EnvAgencyMids I'm fed up of you saying there's unlikely to be 'long-term' health impacts. What about our stress & anxiety levels? Sleep deprivation? Our inability to go outside for exercise? I've cried every day this week because the odour has worsened. We've had no respite from this hell.
@SOPH_C_ @EnvAgency Madness #stopthestink It‚Äôs out of control

Seriously?The labour ward is full of gas?What assessment of risk has there been for those giving birth with respiratory conditions,covid&newborn babies @PHE_EoEngland @MattHancock @StaffordshireCC Depraved @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK https://t.co/iEwVTkCm5o

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids Complete and utter nonsense. It stinks worse than ever. Sort it out @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink

It's absolutely disgusting tonight!!! The weather conditions cannot create the perfect storm EVERY weekend! @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink #capitoff
@annjsmall @EnvAgencyMids Exactly how would @ClareDinnisEA feel if it was her kid being gassed out suffering all those symptoms. She doesn‚Äôt care one bit

@poppers82 @EnvAgencyMids Exactly stalled us again,first monitors,then don't switch them on, weeks to cap cell, knowing it was planned anyway & probs behind schedule, & wouldn't work, another week waiting for report, timing it out til 2026, immoral @ClareDinnsEA we can see straight thru you #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids What I think your hoping will happen is that these pathetic statements will calm people down until 2026 you will spit them out making out you care and hope we go away a bit. We won‚Äôt not until we can relax and breathe in our homes gardens and workplaces. TRY AGAIN EA

@poppers82 @EnvAgencyMids will take them til 2026 to admit it's massive health risk & they should have acted sooner, everything they do is stalling tactic,,why are monitors staying til Aug @ClareDinnisEA if you know capping will #stopthestink. Did you know all along it wont, we did, no fancy equip, a nose

@EnvAgencyMids How has it been allowed to spread this far over such a long time?? With this many complaints about it?? What is being hidden?? How much is at stake here?? And for who?? We are not stupid. Why is big business more important than kid‚Äôs health?? Our health seems unimportant?? Why??

@EnvAgencyMids When are you going to help the situation directly and stop farting around the real issue???!! Help those directly affected, your admitting your ok with children suffering health issues and breathing in gas at school, your condoning the gassing of a hospital and fire station

Read our update to the situation at #WalleysQuarry üëâ https://t.co/o558iBcT3V

Our on-site inspection shows capping work required by the enforcement notice we issued is complete but we still need verification of the work by an independent construction quality assurance assessment https://t.co/12ep6fp39O

@DrAmirKhanGP @sabinashaw20 The LFG builds up at night in calm conditions then floods local communities, sometimes thermally drawn or slight wind, the gas is broken down during the day with UV light so not so evident in Summer!
People are being polluted in their homes at night, wake up authorities to this! https://t.co/yTLBbpfSfh

@WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency Watch developments at Walleys Quarry Newcastle, Staffordshire (StopTheStink ) this is currently an environmental disaster due to mismanagement and EA failing to monitor adequately compliance with their license to operate.

@EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off 8 hours after this statement was made I was submitting my latest complaint by email, the turgid wreak was entering my house 2 miles away from the Landfill. This morning I have a sore throat and headache, another weekend of stink thanks @ClareDinnisEA!

A new Severn Trent sign on the footbridge over Hawthorn Brook at Witton Lakes. First time WatersideCare have seen this one @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWestMidlands @KeepBritainTidy @of_fowl https://t.co/2sMTmdUwLa

@SimonTagg MP Aaron & yourself have tried the nice way but it‚Äôs time now to go with nuisance abatement, don‚Äôt pussyfoot just do it because @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids are complicit, it‚Äôs getting worse & you have 46k people backing you. Shut it down. https://t.co/ZJaMMNSdjL
@TheRealMother2 @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @WHO @EnvAgencyMids I'm particularly concerned by this excerpt https://t.co/tmZTZtV8Fs

Approx 5 miles away from the landfill in Newcastle folks in Stoke have to close their windows because the fumes are so bad.Imagine what it‚Äôs like living in Newcastle.We are literally dying here. SOS @PHE_WestMids @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency #stopthestink @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock https://t.co/RygD0DgVcW
